item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

lol thats just for price
how to make it sellable look in ur item.java
find

[code] FileInputStream dataIn = new FileInputStream(
new File(“data/sellable.dat”));

        while ((c = dataIn.read()) != -1) {
            if (c == 0) {
                itemSellable[counter] = true;
            } else {
                itemSellable[counter] = false;
            }
            counter++;
        }
        dataIn.close();[/code]

add after it my list i got a bunch

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

look in the items.cfx and find the item you want sellable, theres 3 prices, buy, alch, and sell, change prices for all 3 of them, i suggest setting them all the same…

Read full topic

item.title: Items
item.dc:creator: @Striker10777 Striker10777
item.description:
@Striker10777 wrote:

if you using a normal server then look in the data/tradable.dat (open with notepad) and change the ids in there.

Read full topic
